episodes.title: Breaking Cults | Ep. 2 - Shears of Influence
episodes.description: In this episode, we’re tracing the threads of hair—down to its symbolism, power, and vulnerability—from ancient times to the present day. Join in as we journey through myths, modern media, and real-world dynamics, to unravel how control, identity, and manipulation is weaved into our hair. From an immersive audiovisual retelling of Samson and Delilah to a compelling guest monologue by a veteran on military haircutting traditions, this episode dives deep into the social and cultural power of hair. You won’t want to miss this one!
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Breaking Cults | Ep. 1 - Women's Agency in Polygamist Cults
episodes.description: From sensationalized portrayals to hidden truths, this pilot episode of the Breaking Cults podcast delves into the distorted depictions of Mormonism in popular culture. It features a theatrical audiovisual interlude taking us into the shadowy world of Mormonism’s early days, bringing to life the mysterious and often manipulative tactics employed by its founder. In the second half, the episode shifts to an examination of women’s agency in present-day fundamentalist sects, challenging the assumption that only men hold power in these systems. Join in as we unpack how both men and women participate in and enable cultic systems in this 20-minute deep dive.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints
